creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: wool knit and woven boots with tapered tightly embroidered pointed toe; long black legging has geometric multicolored embroidery in horizontal bands that attach to very tight, woven foot (dark colors); inset over top of instep is tightly embroidered in multicolors; coarse multicolored applied or sewn sole; braid tassel at center front of one boot
dimension:
15 1/2 x 12 x 4 1/4 in. (39.37 x 30.48 x 10.8 cm) (each)
5 1/4 in. (13.34 cm) (object part, tassel, one boot only)
title: Pair of Boots
